entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Melfort
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -31.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Melfort 03:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 104.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 65 %

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
